title: Johnny Depp hasn't just been losing money - he's shed a stone in a month on health kick
text:
Depp on the set of his new film Labyrinth in Los Angeles (Photo: FameFlynet UK) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
This week, Johnny Depp proved himself a Hollywood hell-raiser. 
Not only is he broke but it also emerged the one-time hotty has been putting away £24,000 a month of wine... around his waste. 
Then there was his £2.4million mission to blast the ashes of his author pal Hunter S Thompson into space with a cannon. (Top Depp fact.) 
And as Johnny, 53, tightens his belt, I can reveal he’s shed a STONE over the past month and is embarking on a mega health kick. Johnny Depp at a Black Mass photocall during the 72nd Venice Film Festival (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
A Hollywood insider tells me: “He’s lost weight and is living a healthier lifestyle. He’s doing really well. He’s trying to shed the weight that he has put on over the last couple of years and he’s getting results.” Read More Johnny Depp's spending revealed in court documents: From 40 staff to yachts and private planes - and millions on firing friend's ashes out of a cannon 
Johnny’s life started to spiral out of control after the death of his mum in May. Then a bitter divorce battle with actress Amber Heard , 30, ensued. It meant he had to say goodbye to treasured pooches, Pistol and Boo. 
And as the next bizarre chapter of JD’s life unfolds, who would have thought that a gangster rap duo would be his saviour? 
I’m told he has bounced back with his new crime thriller Labyrinth, which recounts the murders of Tupac Shakur and Notorious B.I.G. 
He plays a disgraced LAPD cop who sports a bulky bullet proof vest (not a podgy pot belly). A co-star says they have been left stunned by his thinner frame and chirpy banter. 
They say: “Johnny wasn’t acting like a man who had just been through hell. He didn’t seem down at all in between filming. He is very strong, back to his best and looking great.” 
Maybe it’s the rocket fuel. Like us on Facebook
